name: printing.com
tag_list: graphic-design, printing, print, business-cards, templates, templatecloud, flyerzone, design, indesign, entrepreneurs, france, ireland, united-kingdom, united-states, new-zealand, w3p, flyers, posters, leafelts, bookmarks
overview:
printing.com plc produce printed materials for local businesses and personal use. The company started operating in 1994, when the CEO Tony Rafferty started making flyers for night club owners. Since then, it’s constantly expanded and innovated.

All orders are produced in a central production hub that is equipped with the latest technology to ensure the highest quality for your products.

The orders go through Flyerlink®, a proprietary piece of software developed to help printing.com run smoothly. Flyerlink® started as a way to record orders, and now controls all aspects of production including our machinery. This improved printing.com’s quality and efficiency.

The company operates studios in retail locations to sell printed products and offer personalised artwork. It now owns hundreds of studios across the UK, Ireland, France, Holland, New Zealand and the US. Some of these studios are company-owned stores, but the majority are franchise studios that were started by entrepreneurs who saw the business model and the value it could bring them.

printing.com have developed corporate solutions to help entreprenuers get into the printing market. This includes TemplateCloud, an API to show designer templates on other websites, and w3p a complete software and CMS package that easily enables highstreet printers to process orders and connect with suppliers.
